name: Cat Vibes
description:
You play as a demon cat working for the evil Cathomet!

Use the arrows and spacebar to transmit bad vibes to the happy Dog Village.

This is a game made in 48 hours for the Global Game Jam 2018!

Made with Godot and Aseprite.

Made by:
Eduardo Machado - Project Manager and Game Designer
Egon Araujo - Programmer
Leandro Rodrigues - Programmer
Lucas Fernandes - Programmer
Letícia Pasdiora - HUD Artist
Daniela Jagher - Character Artist
Rafael Tajima (me) - Environment Artist
